title: Dr. Slump. [Vol. 1]
creator: Toriyama, Akira, 1955-
description: Inventor Senbe Norimaki, pleased with himself for creating his masterpiece robot Arale, goes about finding the accessories he needs to convince the residents of Penguin Village that Arale is a real girl
"This book reads from right to left"--Cover p. [4]
